title: Boutique Five-Star Hokitika Lodge Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Leave the world behind on New Zealand’s South Island, where the boutique Rimu Lodge awaits. Located on the West Coast of the island, just 10 minutes' drive from historic Hokitika town, this luxurious lodge - ranked #2 property in the area on Tripadvisor - is a secluded retreat nestled amid native bush.

Rimu Lodge is the only Qualmark five-star bed and breakfast on the West Coast and offers just four beautifully designed rooms for guests aged 14 years and over, making this the ideal destination for ultimate privacy and tranquillity.
offer_address: 33 Seddons Terrace Road, Rimu, Hokitika 7883 New Zealand

title: Boutique Five-Star Hokitika Lodge Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Leave the world behind for the serenity of New Zealand’s South Island, where the boutique Rimu Lodge awaits you for a peaceful escape surrounded by nature. Located on the West Coast of the island, just 10 minutes' drive from historic Hokitika town and three hours from Christchurch, this luxurious lodge - ranked #2 property in the area on TripAdvisor - is a secluded retreat nestled amid native bush. Rimu Lodge is the only Qualmark five-star bed and breakfast on the West Coast and offers just four, beautifully designed rooms for guests aged 14 years and over, making this the ideal destination for ultimate privacy and tranquillity.

Your exquisite escape includes daily continental and cooked à la carte breakfast, nightly drinks by the fireplace and a leisurely late 12pm checkout (subject to availability).
offer_address: 33 Seddons Terrace Road, Rimu, Hokitika 7883 New Zealand
